PAX South!  I was just there in San Antonio, tis a blast.

WTF do we have to do to make RIOT give a shit about their southern fan base and show up to PAX South?
funny how riot was founded and is based in the south.... and does everything in its power not to be there
It was founded and based in California, like most other companies I believe.
las vegas is where it was founded and where HQ is LCS and all the teams are in cali cus it cali :)

It was founded in Los Angeles, the HQ is there too. The LCS was moved to Las Vegas because it's more centered and also better represents League of Legend's growing esports scene. It was primarily just a good business decision.

When are you guys going to come to PAX South. It was so much bigger than last year and my buddies and I were hoping to see you all there, but we were disappointed. There were SEVERAL cosplay of LoL champions that you missed out on. PLEASE come to San Antonio for PAX South 2017!!
